channel.title: [508] Can't find variables, when it is
channel.description:
When I done this tutorial - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342243.0.html step by step added variables, but when i try to compile getting this...:
[code].\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : variable n location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1 switch (n.npcType) { ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:85: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:104: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption2.java:57: cannot find symbol symbol : variable n location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption2 switch (n.npcType) { ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption2.java:65: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption2 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption2.java:82: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption2 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption2.java:100: cannot find symbol symbol : variable k location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption2 p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL vlReq / 4); ^ 8 errors
[/code]
These variables I added to NPCOption1,NPCOption2: [code] NPC n = Engine.npcs[p.clickId]; int k = p.skillLvl[10];[/code]

item.title: [508] Can't find variables, when it is
item.dc:creator: @ArmaxZ ArmaxZ
item.description:
@ArmaxZ wrote:

When I done this tutorial - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342243.0.html step by step added variables, but when i try to compile getting thisâ€¦:

[code].\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption1.java:58: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable n
location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1
switch (n.npcType) {

symbol : variable k
location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption1
p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL
vlReq / 4);
^

p.fishTimer = Misc.random(15 + (k / 8) - p.fishL
vlReq / 4);
^
.\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\NPCOption2.java:57: cannot find symbol

switch (n.npcType) {

vlReq / 4);
^

location: class palidino76.rs2.io.packets.NPCOption2

vlReq / 4);
^
8 errors

[/code]

These variables I added to NPCOption1,NPCOption2:

NPC n = Engine.npcs[p.clickId]; int k = p.skillLvl[10];
